byline.contributor: Emily Steel contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Apple prepares for annual developer conference, at which it plans to release new tools for software makers to create smarter apps for its new Apple Watch; new, deeper applications are crucial for success of product, which has so far not boasted any groundbreaking software, largely out of fear that it would take too long to load; new tools will include better access to device's heart-rate and motion sensors.
lead_paragraph: Apple is set to unveil new app tools for its watch on Monday, as well as software updates and a streaming music service. Missing will be the Apple TV.

headline.main: Apple to Unveil Tool Kit for Watch App Developers
headline.print_headline: Apple’s Developer Conference Will Rally Around the Watch

snippet: Apple is set to unveil new app tools for its watch on Monday, as well as software updates and a streaming music service. Missing will be the Apple TV.
